thread.title: BRIEF-Allied Motion Technologies - Won Nomination For About $70 Mln Award To Provide Customer-Specific Solution For Co's Vehicle Market, Primarily In Europe

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Allied Motion Technologies - Won Nomination For About $70 Mln Award To Provide Customer-Specific Solution For Co's Vehicle Market, Primarily In Europe
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Allied Motion Technologies Inc:
* ALLIED MOTION TECHNOLOGIES - WON NOMINATION FOR ABOUT $70 MILLION AWARD TO PROVIDE CUSTOMER-SPECIFIC SOLUTION FOR COâ€˜S VEHICLE MARKET, PRIMARILY IN EUROPE
* ALLIED MOTION TECHNOLOGIES INC - REVENUE FOR APPLICATION IS EXPECTED TO BEGIN RAMPING IN 2020 AND BE SUBSTANTIALLY COMPLETED IN 2028 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
